content: Hello everyone, I have finished learning the rust language, and now I am interested in the rust compiler. I want to join the rust compiler and contribute to rust. How do I learn? Thanks!

@kang Lei thank you for volunteering! The best way to get started is to pick an issue that looks interesting: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues. E-medium, E-mentor, or E-easy issues will usually have some instructions. You'll also find https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org helpful.
